page.title: 16 ******RELIGIONS******
page.content: In Willington there are two churches. The {Baptist Church }and the {Church of England. } The Baptist church building is three years old and the Church of England, Parish Church, is 800years old. The pastor of the Baptist church is Mr.O.Eley. The secretary is Mr.G.Armson.On sundays about 60 people attend the service at the Baptist church. There is also a midweek prayer meeting and bible study group. The vicar at the Anglican church is Rev. J.Cooper. About 120 people attend weekly services at this church. In Findern there are two churches. The Methodist Church and the All Saints Church(Anglican). The pastor of the Methodist church is Mr.R.Torrington with visiting ministers.The vicar of Findern is also Rev.J.Cooper.
